artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/8-1/2" strips of leather and/or vinyl separated by 2 shots of white yarn form weft. Light scrim glued to reverse. Slightly different than 99.1.1012.28. (black & white)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
